A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Made an account just to review this shart of a film. I didn't think it could get much worse after TFA. I was very wrong. The story is a mess\, characterization is a farce\, the humor is awkward and out of place\, and the ‘themes' it tries to shove down your throat are complete dogshit. This is the last star wars movie I pay to see.
